scar

Class Hash

  • java.lang.Object
    • scar.Hash

  • public class Hash
extends java.lang.Object
    Hash contains any hash-related functionality to the application this includes: - hashchainning - generating HMACs - verifying HMACs

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hash

        public Hash()
        Initialize our Hash class. We make use of the SHA256 Digest algorithm via Spongy Castle

    • Method Detail

      • hashSize

        public int hashSize()
        Returns:
        the size of the hash produced by our digest

      • macSize

        public int macSize()
        Returns:
        the size of the HMAC produced by our digest

      • addHMac

        public void addHMac(byte[] key,
                    byte[] content)
        Prepends an HMAC into our data array with a given key for authentication later on
        Parameters:
        key - private key associated with this data
        content - original data byte array with space for the HMAC in the first @see Hash#macSize macSize bytes

      • checkHMac

        public byte[] checkHMac(byte[] key,
                        byte[] data)
        Input Data format:
        _______________________
        | n-byte HMAC |
        |-----------------------|
        | Data... |
        |_______________________|
        Removes the expected n-byte HMAC, computes HMAC of Data and verifies it against what we expected. Returns null if corrupted, otherwise the data itself
        Parameters:
        key - private key associated with this data
        data - data with HMAC prepended to it, see format above
        Returns:
        if HMAC is valid returns the original data byte array, otherwise, null.

      • getHash

        public byte[] getHash(java.lang.String content)
        Generic function for getting the hash of a string This called @see Hash#getHash(byte[]) getHash(byte[])
        Parameters:
        content - string to hash
        Returns:
        hash of input string

      • getHash

        public byte[] getHash(byte[] content)
        Generic function for getting the hash of a byte array
        Parameters:
        content - byte array to hash
        Returns:
        hash of input byte array

      • hashchain

        public byte[][] hashchain(int n,
                          byte[] key)
        Computes the hashchain given a key and specified number of hashes desired
        Parameters:
        n - number of hashes desired
        key - private key to start the hashchain
        Returns:
        array of each hash in the chain
